name: Ruins of AgonDray (Rough Build)
description:
Title: Ruins of Agondray

Platform: PC

Genre: Adventure/Hunting

Rating/Target Market: E and Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Guide your robot through the cave after having been trapped from the outside. Avoid the slimes and their various machinations and collect relics to escape your way to freedom. Relics permit progression in the level as well as give you extra hits against exposure to the Guardians of the Cave.

Instructions: WASD to move, shift to sprint. Collect relics to boost health, each point of health protects against an attack from the enemy whether directly touching them or one of their red mines. You will not lose relics if you get hit. Escape to exit the game.
